resources.string: Welcome in the Shoe Store Project!

Follow the next steps to add, and list shoes:

\n
Tap the SHOE LIST button to list shoes \n
Tap the + button to upload new shoe datas \n
Fill the form \n
Tap on SAVE button to save a new shoe \n
or tap on the CANCEL button to cancel your input
